name: Tranquil Blue
overview:
Hello, My name is John Siebert. I run a web design company in Tampa called TranquilBlue. I ran across Crunch Base and was curious if you allowed other web design professionals to write posts on it. You can check out some of my blog writing here - http://www.tampawebdesigner.net/category/blog

And here is some more information about me and my company - http://www.johnsiebert.com/ http://www.tampawebdesigner.net/

I was thinking about writing a post on one of these topics:

-Why You’ll Need Google+ -Top Ten Worst Things That Hurt Your SEO -5 Things That Bring Web Site Success -Why You Should Care About WordPress’ v3.2 Release -Business Blogging Tips for Success

I am also interested in purchasing link advertising on your site. Please let me know if any of this is a possibility.

Regards John
